â¶ ä»¤æˆ‘æ„Ÿæ©çš„ 3 ä»¶äº‹... //æ„è¯†åˆ°ç”Ÿå‘½ä¸­çš„ç¾å¥½ç‚¹æ»´ï¼Œä¸ä»¥æ¶ˆæçš„å¿ƒæ€å¼€å§‹ä¸€å¤©ã€‚é†’æ¥ä»¥åä¸å¦¨æ„Ÿè°¢ä¸€ä¸‹çª—å¤–æ˜åªšçš„é˜³å…‰å’Œæ¸©æš–çš„è¢«çªæˆ–è€…ç»™ä½ åšäº†æ—©é¤çš„å®¶äººã€‚// # # # !! â· ä¼šä½¿ä»Šå¤©æ›´ç¾å¥½çš„ 3 ä»¶äº‹ï¼Ÿ //åšäº†ä¼šæ„Ÿè§‰ç¾å¥½å’Œè½»æ¾çš„å¾…åŠäº‹é¡¹ï¼Œè¦å°½é‡å…·ä½“ä¸”æœ‰å¸Œæœ›å®Œæˆï¼Œä¸‰ä»¶äº‹æƒ…è¶³å¤Ÿå……å®ä¸€å¤©ã€‚// # # # !! â¸ ä»Šå¤©æˆ‘æ˜¯è°ï¼Ÿ //æ˜ç¡®è‡ªå·±çš„èº«ä»½å’ŒèŒè´£æœ‰åŠ©äºè®©ç”Ÿæ´»å’Œå·¥ä½œæ›´é«˜æ•ˆã€‚ä»Šå¤©ä½ æ˜¯è°å‘¢ï¼Ÿæ˜¯å³å°†ä¸Šçº¿çš„é¡¹ç›®è´Ÿè´£äººï¼Œæ˜¯è¦æŒ‰æ—¶æ¥å­©å­æ”¾å­¦çš„å®¶é•¿è¿˜æ˜¯å‡†å¤‡è€ƒè¯•çš„å­¦ç”Ÿã€‚// æˆ‘æ˜¯è°ï¼Ÿ !! â¹ ä»Šå¤©å‘ç”Ÿçš„ 3 ä»¶ç¾å¦™çš„äº‹... //å›é¡¾ä»Šå¤©è®©è‡ªå·±æœ‰æ‰€è§¦åŠ¨æˆ–å¼€å¿ƒçš„äº‹æƒ…ï¼Œå¯ä»¥å¯¹åº”ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªé—®é¢˜å›ç­”ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥è®°å½•æœ‰å“ªäº›æ„å¤–æ”¶è·ã€‚// # # # !! âº æ€ä¹ˆåšä¼šè®©ä»Šå¤©æ›´å¥½ï¼Ÿ //ä»Šå¤©çš„ä½ å·²ç»è¶³å¤Ÿå¥½äº†ï¼Œä½†ä¸å¦¨å†åšä¸ªå°æ€»ç»“æƒ³æƒ³æœ‰å“ªäº›å¯ä»¥æ”¹è¿›çš„åœ°æ–¹ï¼Œè®©ä»Šå¤©å˜å¾—æ›´å¥½ã€‚// æ€ä¹ˆåšï¼Ÿ "},"$:/xp/diary/Templates/new-template":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Templates/new-template","action-tiddler":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/new-template","caption":"New Template","color":"rgba(204,204,204,0.5)","icon":"$:/core/images/new-button","tags":"$:/tags/JournalTemplate"},"$:/xp/diary/Templates/nine-square-diary":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Templates/nine-square-diary","action-tiddler":"$:/xp/diary/Actions/nine-square-diary","caption":"Nine Square Diary","color":"rgba(255,204,0,0.5)","description":"ã€Œä¹å®«æ ¼æ—¥è®°æ³•ã€é€šè¿‡åˆ¶å®šä¹ä¸ªç»´åº¦æ¥è½»æ¾åœ°è¿›è¡Œæ™¨é—´æ—¥è®°ã€‚æ¯å¤©èŠ± 3 åˆ†é’Ÿåœ¨ç›¸åº”ç»´åº¦å†…å¡«ä¸Šâ€œå…³é”®è¯â€ï¼Œå›é¡¾æ˜¨å¤©ï¼Œå±•æœ›ä»Šå¤©ã€‚","tags":"$:/tags/JournalTemplate","text":"!! â“¿ æ—¥æœŸ/å¤©æ°”/å¿ƒæƒ… |!DATE |TODAY | |!WEATHER |é˜´Â·æ™´Â·é£Â·é›¨Â·é›ª | |!MOOD |ğŸ™‚ğŸ™ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜¡ğŸ˜²ğŸ˜µâ€ğŸ’«ğŸ˜­ğŸ’¯ é«˜å…´Â·å¿«ä¹Â·åº†å¹¸Â·ç”œèœœÂ·æ„¤æ…¨Â·æ¼æ€’Â·æ°”æ„¤Â·æ‚²å“€Â·æ‚²ä¼¤Â·ä¼¤æ„ŸÂ·ä¼¤å¿ƒÂ·ç—›è‹¦Â·ç—›å¿ƒÂ·å¿ƒé…¸Â·èƒ†æ€¯Â·å®³æ€•Â·æƒŠå“Â·å¯æ€•Â·ç€è¿·Â·å¿ƒé†‰Â·å†¤ä»‡Â·ä»‡è§†Â·å«‰å¦’Â·åæ„ŸÂ·å¯æ¨Â·å¯æ¶Â·è®¨åŒÂ·æ†æ¨Â·åˆ«æ‰­Â·çªå›ŠÂ·æ‹…å¿§Â·æ‹…å¿ƒÂ·å‘æ„Â·å¿§è™‘Â·å¿§éƒÂ·æ— èƒ½æ„ŸÂ·éª„å‚²Â·å‚²æ…¢Â·ä½“é¢Â·è‡ªå‘Â·è‡ªä¿¡Â·è‡ªè±ªÂ·å§”å±ˆÂ·æ€¥èºÂ·ç„¦è™‘Â·ææ…ŒÂ·ç¾æ„§Â·å®³ç¾Â·äºå¿ƒÂ·æ„§ç–šÂ·ä¸ºéš¾Â·ä¸¢è„¸Â·è€»è¾±Â·æ‚”è¿‡Â·æ‡Šæ‚”Â·åæ‚”Â·å†…ç–šÂ·å¥½å¥‡Â·æƒŠè®¶Â·ç–‘æƒ‘Â·è¿·èŒ«Â·æ‚¼å¿µÂ·ç‰µæŒ‚Â·æƒ¦å¿µÂ·è½»è§†Â·æ­§è§†Â·é¡ºå¿ƒÂ·ç­‰å¾…Â·æ†§æ†¬Â·è¾¾è§‚Â·æ— æœ›Â·å¿ƒå¯’Â·å­¤å•Â·å¯‚å¯Â·å“€ä¼¤Â·å®‰å®šÂ·å¦ç„¶Â·å®‰å¿ƒÂ·é‡Šæ€€Â·è¸å®Â·å¹³é™Â·ç´§å¼ Â·æ¶ˆæ²‰Â·ä½æ²‰Â·è§£æ°”Â·æ³„æ°”Â·ä¸§æ°”Â·åŒå€¦Â·è¾›é…¸Â·å¤±æ„ | !! â¶ å¼€å¿ƒçš„äº‹ !! â· ä¸ºä»–äººåšçš„äº‹ !! â¸ è®¡åˆ’/å·¥ä½œ/å¤‡å¿˜ !! â¹ æ¯”èµ·æ˜¨å¤©çš„è¿›æ­¥ !! âº å¿ƒæƒ…/æ„Ÿæ‚Ÿ/çµæ„Ÿ !! â» å…³æ³¨/å…«å¦/æ–°é—» !! â¼ å¥åº·/é¥®é£Ÿ/ä½“é‡ !! â½ æ¢¦å¢ƒ "},"$:/config/xp/DailyNotes/DefaultView":{"title":"$:/config/xp/DailyNotes/DefaultView","text":"list"},"$:/dailynotes-activities":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-activities","caption":"ä»Šæ—¥æ´»åŠ¨","text":"\define tiddlers-created-today() [all[tiddlers]!is[system]!has[draft.of]sameday:created] \end \define tiddlers-modified-today() [all[tiddlers]!is[system]!has[draft.of]sameday] \end <$macrocall $name="table-dynamic" caption="Created Tiddlers" filter=<> fields="tbl-expand title tags" class="w-100" editButton=no emptyMessage=" " /> <$macrocall $name="table-dynamic" caption="Modified Tiddlers" filter="[subfilter] -[subfilter]" fields="tbl-expand title tags" class="w-100" editButton=no emptyMessage=" " />"},"$:/dailynotes-edit-tiddler":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-edit-tiddler"},"$:/dailynotes-editing":{"title":"$:/dailynotes-editing","caption":"æ¯æ—¥ä¸€è®°","text":"\define config-visibility-title() $:/config/EditorToolbarButtons/Visibility/$(currentTiddler)$ \end \define importFileActions() <$action-popup $state=<> $coords="(0,0,0,0)" $floating="yes"/> \end \define select-a-template() \whitespace trim Start with a template:
<$list filter="[[$:/tags/JournalTemplate]tagging[]!is[draft]]"> <$macrocall $name="flex-button" tid=<> icon={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerIconFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] }}} colour={{{ [] :cascade[all[shadows+tiddlers]tag[$:/tags/TiddlerColourFilter]!is[draft]get[text]] }}} palette={{$:/palette}}/>
\end \define input-cancel-actions() \whitespace trim <$action-confirm $message="Are you sure you want to delete Today's Note?"> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<> /> \end \define exclude() $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/transcludify $:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/inc $:/core/ui/EditorToolbar/excise $:/xp/ui/EditorToolbar/annotate \end <$let edit-preview-state={{{ [{$:/config/ShowEditPreview/PerTiddler}!match[yes]then[$:/state/showeditpreview]] :else[] }}} importTitle=<> importState=<> journalTitleTemplate={{$:/config/NewJournal/Title}} journalTag={{{ [enlist{$:/config/NewJournal/Tags}first[]] }}} editTiddler="$:/dailynotes-edit-tiddler" placeholder="Type the text"> <$wikify name="journalTitle" text="<$macrocall $name='now' format=<>/>"> <$list filter="[is[tiddler]]" emptyMessage=<>>

has[description]then[xp-flex-button-name]else[xp-flex-button-name-only]] }}}> <$transclude tiddler="""$icon$"""/><$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>
has[description]then[xp-flex-button-body]else[xp-flex-button-body-none]] }}}> <$transclude field="description" mode="block"/>
\end \define flex-button(tid,icon,colour,palette) \whitespace trim

\end "},"$:/xp/diary/styles":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/styles","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":".xp-buttons { display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; margin: 0 0 14px 0; } .tc-tiddlylink.xp-button { font-weight: normal; max-width: 100%; position: relative; display: flex; flex-direction: column; background: <>; color: <>; width: 200px; min-height: 0; padding: 0 0 0.5em 0; margin: 0.5em; border: none; border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 0 1px 3px 0 #d4d4d5, 0 0 0 1px #d4d4d5; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease,transform .3s ease; } @media (max-width: 500px) { .xp-buttons { padding: 0; } .tc-tiddlylink.xp-button { margin: 0.25em; width: 45%; } } .xp-flex-button { position: relative; display: inline-block; } .xp-flex-button button:hover { <> } .xp-flex-button { width: 200px; height: 123.6px; padding: 1em; margin: .5em .6em; } button.xp-flex-button, span.xp-flex-button { display: inline-block; padding: 0.16em 0.7em; font-size: 0.9em; font-weight: normal; line-height: 1.2em; color: <>; white-space: break-spaces; vertical-align: baseline; background-color: <>; border-color: <>; border-radius: 1em; } .xp-flex-button svg, .xp-flex-button img { height: 0.9em; width: 0.9em; margin-right: 7px; margin-bottom: 1px; vertical-align: bottom; } .xp-flex-button-name, .xp-flex-button-name-only { font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.2; font-weight: 600; transition: color 0.3s ease-in-out; padding: 0.5em 10px; } .xp-flex-button-name-only { padding: 0 10px; } .xp-flex-button-body { position: relative; font-size: 0.8em; line-height: 1.2; margin: 0; height: 55px; overflow: hidden; text-overflow: ellipsis; display: -webkit-box; -webkit-line-clamp: 4; -webkit-box-orient: vertical; } .xp-flex-button-body-none { display: none; margin-bottom: 10px; background: <>; font-size: 0.8em; line-height: 1.2; } .tc-link-info-item h1 { font-weight: 500; font-size: 16px; } .tc-scrollable-demo { border: 1px solid <>; background-color: <>; padding: 1em; height: 400px; position: relative; overflow: auto; } .tc-improvement-banner { font-size: 0.7em; background: #fcc; padding-left: 5px; margin-top: 6px; margin-bottom: 12px; <> } @media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-improvement-banner { } } @media (min-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-improvement-banner { margin-right: -53px; margin-left: -53px; } .tc-improvement-banner:before { display: block; position: absolute; width: 0; height: 0; content: " "; margin-left: -5px; margin-top: -10px; border-top: 5px solid transparent; border-left: 5px solid transparent; border-right: 5px solid #C07E7E; border-bottom: 5px solid #C07E7E; } } .tc-improvement-banner svg { width: 1em; height: 1em; } .tc-wrapper-flex { display: flex; } .tc-saving-sidebar { margin: 0; padding: 0; min-width: 200px; overflow: auto; } .tc-saving-sidebar a { display: block; } @media (max-width: {{$:/themes/tiddlywiki/vanilla/metrics/sidebarbreakpoint}}) { .tc-wrapper-flex { flex-direction: column; } .tc-saving-sidebar { width: 100%; height: auto; } .tc-saving-sidebar a { float: left; } } .tc-saving-sidebar-category { margin-bottom: 10px; } .tc-saving-sidebar-category-title { font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 5px; font-size: 16px; } .tc-saving-sidebar-category-item { margin-left: 10px; } .tc-card { margin: 15px; padding: 10px 20px; border-radius: 10px; border-top: 5px solid #45D3D3; box-shadow: 0 8px 17px -8px #A3A5AE; background-color: #FFF; width: 200px; transition: box-shadow 0.3s ease-in-out; font-size: 13px; line-height: 18px; } .tc-card:hover { box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3); } .tc-card:hover .tc-card-title { color: #1462ff; } .tc-card-title { text-align: center; font-size: 1.2em; font-weight: 600; transition: color 0.2s ease-in-out; padding: 10px 0; } .tc-card-author { text-align: right; } .tc-card p { height: 67px; overflow: hidden; margin: 0; padding: 13px 0; } .tc-card a { color: #222; } .tc-card a:hover { text-decoration:none; } .tc-card a:active, .tc-card a:focus, .tc-btn-download:active, .tc-btn-download:focus{ outline: none; } div.content { padding: 1px 16px; display: flex; flex-wrap: wrap; } .tc-btn-download { width: 250px; padding: 10px; border-radius: 5px; background: #1462ff; border-radius: 5px; border: none; box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 0 #4a74c9; overflow: hidden; cursor: pointer; font-size: 1.2em; line-height: 1.4em; color: #fff; fill: #fff; } .tc-btn-download:active { background: #1475ff; <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-focus-selector" $param=""".xp-diarycard-search input"""/> "},"$:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals","description":"Starred journals","filter":"[tagtag[Star]!is[system]!sort[created]]","tags":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","text":"<>"},"$:/xp/diary/Stylesheet/journal":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/Stylesheet/journal","tags":"$:/tags/Stylesheet","text":"/* è‡ªå®šä¹‰æ—¥å¿—æ¡ç›®çš„æ ·å¼ */ [data-tags*="Journal"], [data-tiddler-title="Diary"] { border-radius: 8px; } [data-tags*="Private"] { border: 1px solid rgba(94, 54, 191, 0.39); } @media print { .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 60px; margin-top: 25px; } .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper { padding-left: 60px; } } @media screen { .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper, .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 20px; } } @media screen and (max-width: 960px) { .journal .tc-tiddler-title, .journal .tc-subtitle, .journal .tc-tags-wrapper, .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-left: 30px; } } .journal:before { content: ""; position: absolute; top: 0; bottom: 0; left: 3px; width: 37px; background: radial-gradient(<> 4px, transparent 5px) repeat-y; background-size: 30.4px 30.4px; z-index: 1010; } .journal .tc-tiddler-body { padding-top: 6px; font-family: "Handlee", cursive; font-weight: 300; line-height: 2em; color: <>; } /* Setting font for other elements */ .journal .tc-tiddler-body pre, .journal .tc-tiddler-body code, .journal .tc-tiddler-body pre code { font-family: "Handlee", cursive; font-weight: 300; }"},"$:/xp/diary/card-template":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/card-template","text":"\define tw-card-template(bordercolor:"")
<$link>
<$list filter="[all[current]has[encrypted]]">{{$:/core/images/locked-padlock}}
<$transclude field="caption"><$view field="title"/>
<$view field="created" format="date" template="YYYY 0MM0DD"/>

<$transclude field="text"/>

\end <$macrocall $name="tw-card-template" bordercolor={{!!color}}/>"},"$:/config/NewPrivateJournal/Tags":{"title":"$:/config/NewPrivateJournal/Tags","text":"Private"},"$:/xp/images/diary":{"title":"$:/xp/images/diary","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/images/diarycard":{"title":"$:/xp/images/diarycard","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/images/newprivate":{"title":"$:/xp/images/newprivate","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/images/private":{"title":"$:/xp/images/private","tags":"$:/tags/Image","text":""},"$:/xp/diary/macros":{"title":"$:/xp/diary/macros","text":"\define journalFilter() [tag!is[system]!has[draft.of]!sort[created]] \end \define privateJournalFilter() [tagtag[Private]!is[system]!has[draft.of]!sort[created]] \end \define journalSearchFilter() [tag!is[system]!sort[created]search{$:/temp/journalsearch}] \end \define commonFilters(name) \whitespace trim <$button tooltip={{!!description}} aria-label={{!!description}} class="tc-tiny-gap-right"> <$action-deletetiddler $filter="$:/config/journalsearch/searchmode"/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch" text={{!!filter}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/input" text={{!!filter}}/> <$action-setfield $tiddler="$:/temp/journalsearch/refresh" text="yes"/> $name$ \end 
<$view field="text"/>
"},"$:/tags/JournalFilter":{"title":"$:/tags/JournalFilter","list":"$:/xp/diary/Filters/CommonFilters $:/xp/diary/Filters/AllJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/FilterByDate $:/xp/diary/Filters/EncryptedJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/PrivateJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/RecentJournals $:/xp/diary/Filters/StarredJournals"}}}
